name: Tron
description:
Tron inspired theme based on Linux Mint theme.

v1.1: background image size 1600x1600

         panel bg image size 1900x50

v1.2: background-image moved from .popup-menu-boxpointer to .popup-menu

v1.4: popup menu highlight, sound applet (sliders, player buttons highlight)

v1.5b: Cinnamon 2.2 compatibility (added .menu-application-button:highlighted and .menu-application-button-selected:highlighted)
tweaked the panel a bit
